trans-unit.source: The Replica Compiler (repc) generates QObject header files based on an API definition file. The file (called a "rep" file) uses a specific (text) syntax to describe the API. By convention, these files are given a .rep file extension, short for Replica. When these files are processed by repc, repc generates both Source and Replica header files.
trans-unit.target: La Rep lica C ompiler (REPC) genera QObject archivos de cabecera sobre la base de un archivo de definición de API. El archivo (llamado archivo "rep") utiliza una sintaxis específica (texto) para describir la API. Por convención, estos archivos reciben una extensión de archivo .rep, abreviatura de Replica. Cuando repc procesa estos archivos, repc genera archivos de encabezado de origen y réplica .

trans-unit.source: The API can be identified by the QPlatform* class prefix, and is used for implementing higher level classes typically found in Qt GUI, e.g. QPlatformWindow for window system integration exposed through QWindow, or QPlatformTheme for deeper platform theming and integration, exposed through QStyleHint and QStyle.
The API consists of over 20 effects provided as separate QML types. The effects cover functional areas such as blending, masking, blurring, coloring, and many more.
trans-unit.target: El API consiste en más de 20 efectos proporcionados como tipos separados de QML.Los efectos cubren áreas funcionales como la mezcla,el enmascaramiento,el desenfoque,la coloración y muchos más.

trans-unit.source: The API for deep linking in StackView is the same as for basic navigation. Pushing an array instead of a single item adds all the items in that array to the stack. The transition animation, however, is applied only for the last item in the array. The normal semantics of push() apply for deep linking, that is, it adds whatever is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: La API para enlaces profundos en StackView es la misma que para la navegación básica. Empujar una matriz en lugar de un solo elemento agrega todos los elementos de esa matriz a la pila. Sin embargo, la animación de transición se aplica solo al último elemento de la matriz. La semántica normal de push () se aplica a los enlaces profundos, es decir, agrega lo que se inserta en la pila.

trans-unit.source: The API for deep linking in StackView is the same as for basic navigation. Pushing an array instead of a single item, will involve that all the items in that array will be pushed onto the stack. The transition animation, however, will be conducted as if only the last item in the array was pushed onto the stack. The normal semantics of push() apply for deep linking, meaning that push() adds whatever is pushed onto the stack. Note also that only the last item of the array will be loaded. The rest will be lazy-loaded as needed when entering the screen upon subsequent calls to pop (or when requesting the item by using
trans-unit.target: La API para enlaces profundos en StackView es la misma que para la navegación básica. Insertar una matriz en lugar de un solo elemento implicará que todos los elementos de esa matriz se inserten en la pila. Sin embargo, la animación de transición se llevará a cabo como si solo el último elemento de la matriz se hubiera introducido en la pila. La semántica normal de push () se aplica a los enlaces profundos, lo que significa que push () agrega lo que se inserta en la pila. Tenga en cuenta también que solo se cargará el último elemento de la matriz. El resto se cargará de forma diferida según sea necesario cuando ingrese a la pantalla en posteriores llamadas a pop (o cuando solicite el elemento utilizando

trans-unit.source: The API for deep linking in StackView is the same as for basic navigation. Pushing an array instead of a single item adds all the items in that array to the stack. The transition animation, however, is applied only for the last item in the array. The normal semantics of push() apply for deep linking, that is, it adds whatever is pushed onto the stack.

The API for deep linking in StackView is the same as for basic navigation. Pushing an array instead of a single item, will involve that all the items in that array will be pushed onto the stack. The transition animation, however, will be conducted as if only the last item in the array was pushed onto the stack. The normal semantics of push() apply for deep linking, meaning that push() adds whatever is pushed onto the stack. Note also that only the last item of the array will be loaded. The rest will be lazy-loaded as needed when entering the screen upon subsequent calls to pop (or when requesting the item by using

trans-unit.source: The API is similar to that of views like ListView and PathView; a model and delegate can be set, and the count and currentItem properties provide read-only access to information about the view. To position the view at a certain index, use positionViewAtIndex().
trans-unit.target: La API es similar a la de vistas como ListView y PathView ; se puede establecer un modelo y un delegado , y las propiedades count y currentItem brindan acceso de solo lectura a la información sobre la vista. Para colocar la vista en un índice determinado, use positionViewAtIndex () .

trans-unit.source: The API is similar to that of views like ListView and PathView; a model and delegate can be set, and the count and currentItem properties provide read-only access to information about the view. To position the view at a certain index, use positionViewAtIndex().

The API is split into sub-modules, which provide QML and C++ interfaces for specific purposes. They focus mainly on Map and Place information. The required position data can be retrieved using the QtPositioning module.
trans-unit.target: La API se divide en submódulos, que proporcionan interfaces QML y C ++ para fines específicos. Se centran principalmente en la información de mapas y lugares. Los datos de posición necesarios se pueden recuperar utilizando el módulo QtPositioning .

trans-unit.source: The API of QStyle contains functions that draw the widgets, static helper functions to do common and difficult tasks (e.g., calculating the position of slider handles) and functions to do the various calculations necessary while drawing (e.g., for the widgets to calculate their size hints). The style also helps some widgets with the layout of their contents. In addition, it creates a QPalette that contains QBrushes to draw with.
trans-unit.target: La API de QStyle contiene funciones que dibujan los widgets, funciones auxiliares estáticas para realizar tareas comunes y difíciles (por ejemplo, calcular la posición de los controles deslizantes) y funciones para realizar los diversos cálculos necesarios mientras se dibuja (por ejemplo, para que los widgets calculen su tamaño pistas). El estilo también ayuda a algunos widgets con el diseño de su contenido. Además, crea una QPalette que contiene QBrush es para dibujar.

trans-unit.source: The API of Qt Quick Controls 2 aims to be clean and simple. Common operations are easy, and more advanced ones are liberally documented with snippets that can be copied into your code.
trans-unit.target: El API de Qt Quick Controls 2 pretende ser limpio y simple.Las operaciones comunes son fáciles,y las más avanzadas se documentan libremente con fragmentos que pueden ser copiados en su código.

trans-unit.source: The API of Qt Quick Controls 2 is very similar to Qt Quick Controls 1, but it does come with some changes necessary to facilitate the improvements. The majority of changes are to do with styling; all of a control's delegates are now accessible in the control itself, instead of in a separate style object.
trans-unit.target: La API de Qt Quick Controls 2 es muy similar a la de Qt Quick Controls 1,pero viene con algunos cambios necesarios para facilitar las mejoras.La mayoría de los cambios tienen que ver con el estilo;todos los delegados de un control son ahora accesibles en el propio control,en lugar de en un objeto de estilo separado.

trans-unit.source: The API of Qt Quick Controls aims to be clean and simple. Common operations are easy, and more advanced ones are liberally documented with snippets that can be copied into your code.

The API of Qt Quick Controls is very similar to Qt Quick Controls 1, but it does come with some changes necessary to facilitate the improvements. The majority of changes are to do with styling; all of a control's delegates are now accessible in the control itself, instead of in a separate style object.

The API of the STL iterators is modelled on pointers in an array. For example, the ++ operator advances the iterator to the next item, and the * operator returns the item that the iterator points to. In fact, for QList and QStack, which store their items at adjacent memory positions, the iterator type is just a typedef for T *, and the const_iterator type is just a typedef for const T *.

The API of the STL iterators is modelled on pointers in an array. For example, the ++ operator advances the iterator to the next item, and the * operator returns the item that the iterator points to. In fact, for QVector and QStack, which store their items at adjacent memory positions, the iterator type is just a typedef for T *, and the const_iterator type is just a typedef for const T *.
trans-unit.target: La API de los iteradores de STL se basa en punteros en una matriz. Por ejemplo, el operador ++ avanza el iterador al siguiente elemento y el operador * devuelve el elemento al que apunta el iterador. De hecho, para QVector y QStack , que almacenan sus elementos en posiciones de memoria adyacentes, el tipo de iterador es solo un typedef para T * , y el tipo const_iterator es solo un typedef para const T * .

trans-unit.source: The API works just like with QStringList, as shown in the previous section.
trans-unit.target: La API funciona igual que con QStringList , como se muestra en la sección anterior.

trans-unit.source: The AbstractTexture class shouldn't be used directly but rather through one of its subclasses. Each subclass implements a given texture target (2D, 2DArray, 3D, CubeMap ...) Each subclass provides a set of functors for each layer, cube map face and mipmap level. In turn the backend uses those functor to properly fill a corresponding OpenGL texture with data. It is expected the functor does as minimal processing as possible so as not to slow down textures generation and upload. If the content of a texture is the result of a slow procedural generation process, it is recommended not to implement this directly in a functor.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveX server could not shut down properly when the last client stopped using it. It usually takes about two seconds for the application to terminate, but you might have to use the task manager to kill the process (e.g. when a client doesn't release the controls properly).

trans-unit.source: The Address has a text property which holds a formatted string. It is the recommended way to display an address to the user and typically takes the format of an address as found on an envelope, but this is not always the case. The text may be automatically generated from constituent address properties such as street, city and and so on, but can also be explicitly assigned. See text for details.
trans-unit.target: La dirección tiene una propiedad de texto que contiene una cadena formateada. Es la forma recomendada de mostrar una dirección al usuario y normalmente toma el formato de una dirección que se encuentra en un sobre, pero no siempre es así. El texto se puede generar automáticamente a partir de propiedades de direcciones constituyentes, como calle , ciudad , etc., pero también se puede asignar explícitamente. Consulte el texto para obtener más detalles.

trans-unit.source: The Balsam tool also has support for converting projects created with Qt 3D Studio into Qt Quick 3D QML projects.

The Balsam tool is a command line application that is part of Qt Quick 3D's asset conditioning pipeline. The purpose is to take assets created in digital content creation tools like Maya, 3ds Max, or Blender and convert them into an efficient runtime format for use with Qt Quick 3D. It is not possible, nor does it make sense to reference the interchange formats directly in applications because a large amount of resources are needed to parse and condition the content of the asset before it is usable for realtime rendering. Instead the interchange formats can be converted via the Balsam tool into QML Components and resources like geometry and textures.

trans-unit.source: The Basic style is a basic all-round style.

The Basic style is a simple and light-weight style that offers the maximum performance for Qt Quick Controls. It is built with a minimal amount of Qt Quick primitives, and keeps animations and transitions to the minimum.

The Bearer Management API controls the system's connectivity state. This incorporates simple information such as whether the device is online and how many interfaces there are as well as enables the application developer to start, stop network interfaces and influences other connection specific details. Depending on the platform's capabilities it may even provide session management so that a network interface remains up for as long as clients have a registered interest in them while at the same time optimizes the interface's uptime.
trans-unit.target: El API de gestión de portadores controla el estado de conectividad del sistema.Esto incorpora información simple como si el dispositivo está en línea y cuántas interfaces hay,así como permite al desarrollador de la aplicación iniciar y detener las interfaces de red e influir en otros detalles específicos de la conexión.Dependiendo de las capacidades de la plataforma,puede incluso proporcionar una gestión de sesiones para que una interfaz de red permanezca activa mientras los clientes tengan un interés registrado en ellas,al tiempo que optimiza el tiempo de actividad de la interfaz.

trans-unit.source: The Big5 codec provides conversion to and from the Big5 encoding. The code was originally contributed by Ming-Che Chuang <mingche@cobra.ee.ntu.edu.tw> for the Big-5+ encoding, and was included in Qt with the author's permission, and the grateful thanks of the Qt team. (Note: Ming-Che's code is QPL'd, as per an mail to qt-info@nokia.com.)
trans-unit.target: El códec Big5 proporciona conversión hacia y desde la codificación Big5. (Nota: el código de Ming-Che es QPL, según un correo a qt-info@nokia.com).

trans-unit.source: The C++ QWebChannel API makes it possible to talk to any HTML client, which could run on a local or even remote machine. The only limitation is that the HTML client supports the JavaScript features used by qwebchannel.js. As such, one can interact with basically any modern HTML browser or standalone JavaScript runtime, such as node.js.
trans-unit.target: La API C ++ QWebChannel permite hablar con cualquier cliente HTML, que podría ejecutarse en una máquina local o incluso remota. La única limitación es que el cliente HTML admite las funciones de JavaScript utilizadas por qwebchannel.js . Como tal, uno puede interactuar básicamente con cualquier navegador HTML moderno o en tiempo de ejecución de JavaScript independiente, como node.js.

trans-unit.source: The CBOR date/time types are extension types using tags: either a string (in ISO date format) tagged as a DateTime or a number (of seconds since the start of 1970, UTC) tagged as a UnixTime_t. When parsing CBOR streams, QCborValue will convert UnixTime_t to the string-based type.

Al analizar los flujos CBOR, QCborValue convertirá UnixTime_t al tipo basado en cadenas.

When parsing CBOR streams, QCborValue will convert UnixTime_t to the string-based type.

The CBOR regular expression type is an extended type represented by a string tagged as an RegularExpression. Note that CBOR regular expressions only store the patterns, so any flags that the QRegularExpression object may carry will be lost.

trans-unit.source: The CBOR stream contains a text string that does not decode properly as UTF-8 (data is corrupt and the error is not recoverable).

The CandlestickSeries type acts as a container for single candlestick items. Each item is drawn to its own category when using BarCategoryAxis. DateTimeAxis and ValueAxis can be used as an alternative to BarCategoryAxis. In this case, each candlestick item is drawn according to its timestamp value.

The Canvas item allows drawing of straight and curved lines, simple and complex shapes, graphs, and referenced graphic images. It can also add text, colors, shadows, gradients, and patterns, and do low level pixel operations. The Canvas output may be saved as an image file or serialized to a URL.
trans-unit.target: El elemento Lienzo permite dibujar líneas rectas y curvas,formas simples y complejas,gráficos e imágenes gráficas de referencia.También puede añadir texto,colores,sombras,degradados y patrones,y hacer operaciones de píxeles de bajo nivel.La salida del Lienzo puede ser guardada como un archivo de imagen o serializada a un URL.

trans-unit.source: The Canvas item supports two render targets: Canvas.Image and Canvas.FramebufferObject.
trans-unit.target: El elemento Canvas admite dos destinos de representación: Canvas.Image y Canvas.FramebufferObject .

trans-unit.source: The Canvas.FramebufferObject render target utilizes OpenGL hardware acceleration rather than rendering into system memory, which in many cases results in faster rendering. Canvas.FramebufferObject relies on the OpenGL extensions GL_EXT_framebuffer_multisample and GL_EXT_framebuffer_blit for antialiasing. It will also use more graphics memory when rendering strategy is anything other than Canvas.Cooperative. Framebuffer objects may not be available with Qt Quick backends other than OpenGL.
trans-unit.target: El destino de renderizado Canvas.FramebufferObject utiliza aceleración de hardware OpenGL en lugar de renderizar en la memoria del sistema, lo que en muchos casos da como resultado un renderizado más rápido. Canvas.FramebufferObject se basa en las extensiones de OpenGL GL_EXT_framebuffer_multisample y GL_EXT_framebuffer_blit para el antialiasing. También utilizará más memoria de gráficos cuando la estrategia de renderizado no sea Canvas.Cooperative. Es posible que los objetos de framebuffer no estén disponibles con backends de Qt Quick que no sean OpenGL.

trans-unit.source: The ChromaticAberration effect simulates an imperfection of optical lenses. These color fringes are caused by different colors refracting at different angles splitting white light into a spectrum. This is called dispersion.

trans-unit.source: The Command pattern is based on the idea that all editing in an application is done by creating instances of command objects. Command objects apply changes to the document and are stored on a command stack. Furthermore, each command knows how to undo its changes to bring the document back to its previous state. As long as the application only uses command objects to change the state of the document, it is possible to undo a sequence of commands by traversing the stack downwards and calling undo on each command in turn. It is also possible to redo a sequence of commands by traversing the stack upwards and calling redo on each command.
trans-unit.target: El patrón de Comando se basa en la idea de que toda la edición en una aplicación se hace creando instancias de objetos de comando.Los objetos de comando aplican los cambios al documento y se almacenan en una pila de comandos.Además,cada comando sabe cómo deshacer sus cambios para devolver el documento a su estado anterior.Mientras la aplicación sólo utilice objetos de comando para cambiar el estado del documento,es posible deshacer una secuencia de comandos recorriendo la pila hacia abajo y llamando a deshacer a cada comando por turno.También es posible rehacer una secuencia de comandos recorriendo la pila hacia arriba y llamando a redoblar en cada comando.

trans-unit.source: The Core profile does not include any of the functions that were removed in OpenGL 3.1. The Compatibility profile contains all functions in the Core profile of the same version plus all of the functions that were removed in OpenGL 3.1. For new OpenGL code the Core profile should be preferred.

The D3D12 adaptation can keep multiple frames in flight, similar to modern game engines. This is somewhat different from the traditional "render - swap - wait for vsync" model and allows for better GPU utilization at the expense of higher resource use. This means that the renderer will be a number of frames ahead of what is displayed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: La adaptación del D3D12 puede mantener múltiples cuadros en vuelo,similar a los motores de los juegos modernos.Esto es algo diferente del modelo tradicional "renderizar-intercambiar-esperar por vsync" y permite una mejor utilización de la GPU a expensas de un mayor uso de los recursos.Esto significa que el renderizador estará un número de fotogramas por delante de lo que se muestra en la pantalla.

trans-unit.source: The D3D12 backend also introduces support for pre-compiled shaders. All the backend's own shaders (used by the built-in materials on which the Rectangle, Image, Text, and other QML types are built with) are compiled to D3D shader bytecode when you compile Qt. Applications using ShaderEffect items can choose to ship bytecode either in regular files, via the Qt resource system, or use High Level Shading Language for DirectX (HLSL) source strings. Unlike OpenGL, the compilation for HLSL is properly threaded, meaning shader compilation won't block the application and its user interface.
trans-unit.target: El backend D3D12 también presenta soporte para sombreadores precompilados. Todos los sombreadores propios del backend (utilizados por los materiales integrados en los que se construyen Rectangle, Image, Text y otros tipos de QML) se compilan en el código de bytes del sombreador D3D cuando compila Qt. Las aplicaciones que utilizan elementos de ShaderEffect pueden elegir enviar código de bytes en archivos normales, a través del sistema de recursos Qt, o utilizar High Level Shading Language para cadenas de origen de DirectX (HLSL). A diferencia de OpenGL, la compilación de HLSL está correctamente enhebrada, lo que significa que la compilación de sombreadores no bloqueará la aplicación y su interfaz de usuario.

trans-unit.source: The Declarative State Machine Framework
trans-unit.target: El marco de la maquinaria del Estado declarativo

trans-unit.source: The Declarative State Machine Framework provides types for creating and executing state graphs in QML. It is similar to the C++ State Machine framework based on Harel's Statecharts: A visual formalism for complex systems, which is also the basis for UML state diagrams. Like its C++ counterpart, the framework provides an API and execution model based on State Chart XML (SCXML) to embed the elements and semantics of statecharts in QML applications.
trans-unit.target: El marco declarativo de la máquina de estado proporciona tipos para crear y ejecutar gráficos de estado en QML. Es similar al marco de C ++ State Machine basado en Statecharts de Harel : un formalismo visual para sistemas complejos , que también es la base de los diagramas de estado UML. Al igual que su contraparte C ++ , el marco proporciona una API y un modelo de ejecución basado en State Chart XML (SCXML) para incrustar los elementos y la semántica de los statecharts en aplicaciones QML.

The selection of the choice is performed based on the value that a model item has for role, and also based on index.

trans-unit.source: The Direct Approach
trans-unit.target: La aproximación directa

trans-unit.source: The Direct3D 12 adaptation for Windows 10, both in Win32 (windows platform plugin) and in UWP (winrt platform plugin), is shipped as a dynamically loaded plugin. This adaptation doesn't work on earlier Windows versions. Building this plugin is enabled automatically, whenever the necessary D3D and DXGI develpoment files are present. In practice, this currently means Visual Studio 2015 and newer.
trans-unit.target: La adaptación de Direct3D 12 para Windows 10, tanto en Win32 ( complemento de la plataforma windows ) como en UWP ( winrt plataforma Winrt ), se envía como un complemento cargado dinámicamente. Esta adaptación no funciona en versiones anteriores de Windows. La creación de este complemento se habilita automáticamente, siempre que estén presentes los archivos de desarrollo D3D y DXGI necesarios. En la práctica, esto significa actualmente Visual Studio 2015 y versiones posteriores.

trans-unit.source: The Direct3D 12 adaptation ignores the QSurfaceFormat set on the QQuickWindow or QQuickView, or set via QSurfaceFormat::setDefaultFormat(), with two exceptions: QSurfaceFormat::samples() and QSurfaceFormat::alphaBufferSize() are still taken into account. When the sample value is greater than 1, multisample offscreen render targets will be created with the specified sample count at the maximum supported quality level. The backend automatically performs resolving into the non-multisample swapchain buffers after each frame.
trans-unit.target: La adaptación de Direct3D 12 ignora el QSurfaceFormat establecido en QQuickWindow o QQuickView , o establecido a través de QSurfaceFormat :: setDefaultFormat (), con dos excepciones: QSurfaceFormat :: samples () y QSurfaceFormat :: alphaBufferSize () todavía se tienen en cuenta. Cuando el valor de la muestra es mayor que 1, se crearán destinos de renderizado fuera de pantalla de múltiples muestras con el recuento de muestras especificado en el nivel de calidad máximo admitido. El backend realiza automáticamente la resolución en los búferes de cadena de intercambio que no son de múltiples muestras después de cada fotograma.

trans-unit.source: The Direct3D 12 adaptation is an alternative renderer for Qt Quick 2 when running on Windows 10, both for Win32 and UWP applications. For more details, see Direct3D 12 Adaptation.

trans-unit.source: The EditorialModel is a read-only model used to fetch editorials related to a Place. Binding a Place via EditorialModel::place initiates an initial fetch of editorials. The model performs fetches incrementally and is intended to be used in conjunction with a View such as a ListView. When the View reaches the last of the editorials currently in the model, a fetch is performed to retrieve more if they are available. The View is automatically updated as the editorials are received. The number of editorials which are fetched at a time is specified by the batchSize property. The total number of editorials available can be accessed via the totalCount property.

trans-unit.source: The FrameGraph tree should be assigned to the activeFrameGraph property of a QRenderSettings component, itself being a component of the root entity in the Qt 3D scene. This is what makes it the active framegraph for the renderer. Of course, since this is a QML property binding, the active framegraph (or parts of it) can be changed on the fly at runtime. For example, if you want to use different rendering approaches for indoor and outdoor scenes or to enable or disable some special effect.
trans-unit.target: El árbol FrameGraph debe asignarse a la propiedad activeFrameGraph de un componente QRenderSettings,siendo él mismo un componente de la entidad raíz en la escena Qt 3D.Esto es lo que lo convierte en el framegraph activo para el renderizador.Por supuesto,dado que se trata de una propiedad QML vinculante,el framegraph activo (o partes de él)puede ser cambiado sobre la marcha en tiempo de ejecución.Por ejemplo,si desea utilizar diferentes enfoques de renderización para escenas de interior y exterior o para activar o desactivar algún efecto especial.

The FullyDecoded mode is similar to the behavior of the functions returning QString in Qt 4.x, in that every character represents itself and never has any special meaning. This is true even for the percent character ('%'), which should be interpreted to mean a literal percent, not the beginning of a percent-encoded sequence. The same actual character, in all other decoding modes, is represented by the sequence "%25".
trans-unit.target: El modo FullyDecoded es similar al comportamiento de las funciones que devuelven QString en Qt 4.x, en que cada carácter se representa a sí mismo y nunca tiene un significado especial. Esto es cierto incluso para el carácter de porcentaje ('%'), que debe interpretarse como un porcentaje literal, no el comienzo de una secuencia codificada en porcentaje. El mismo carácter real, en todos los demás modos de decodificación, está representado por la secuencia "% 25".

trans-unit.source: The GB18030 codec was contributed to Qt by Anthony Fok <anthony@thizlinux.com>, <foka@debian.org> using a Perl script to generate C++ tables from gb-18030-2000.xml while merging contributions from James Su, Justin Yu and Sean Chen. trans-unit.source: The Glucose Measurement characteristic is a variable length structure containing a Flags field, a Sequence Number field, a Base Time field and, based upon the contents of the Flags field, may contain a Time Offset field, Glucose Concentration field, Type-Sample Location field and a Sensor Status Annunciation field.
trans-unit.target: La característica Medición de la glucosa es una estructura de longitud variable que contiene un campo Banderas,un campo Número de secuencia,un campo Tiempo base y,en función del contenido del campo Banderas,puede contener un campo Compensación de tiempo,un campo Concentración de glucosa,un campo Ubicación de tipo de muestra y un campo Anuncio de estado del sensor.

trans-unit.source: The Gooch lighting model is explained fully in the original Gooch paper. The Gooch model mixes a diffuse object color with a user-provided cool color and warm color to produce the end points of a color ramp that is used to shade the object based upon the cosine of the angle between the vector from the fragment to the light source and the fragment's normal vector. Optionally, a specular highlight can be added on top. The relative contributions to the cool and warm colors by the diffuse color are controlled by the alpha and beta properties respecitvely.

The Gooch lighting model is explained fully in the original Gooch paper. The Gooch model mixes a diffuse object color with a user-provided cool color and warm color to produce the end points of a color ramp that is used to shade the object based upon the cosine of the angle between the vector from the fragment to the light source and the fragment's normal vector. Optionally, a specular highlight can be added on top. The relative contributions to the cool and warm colors by the diffuse color are controlled by the alpha and beta properties respecitvely.
trans-unit.target: El modelo de iluminación Gooch se explica completamente en el documento original de Gooch . El modelo Gooch mezcla un color de objeto difuso con un color frío y un color cálido proporcionados por el usuario para producir los puntos finales de una rampa de color que se utiliza para sombrear el objeto según el coseno del ángulo entre el vector desde el fragmento hasta la luz. fuente y el vector normal del fragmento. Opcionalmente, se puede agregar un resalte especular en la parte superior. Las contribuciones relativas a los colores fríos y cálidos por el color difuso están controladas por las propiedades alfa y beta respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The Gooch lighting model uses both color and brightness to help show the curvature of 3D surfaces. This is often better than models such as Phong that rely purely upon changes in brightness. In situations such as in CAD and CAM applications where photorealism is not a goal, the Gooch shading model in conjunction with some kind of silhouette edge inking is a popular solution.
trans-unit.target: El modelo de iluminación de Gooch utiliza tanto el color como el brillo para ayudar a mostrar la curvatura de las superficies 3D.Esto es a menudo mejor que los modelos como Phong que se basan puramente en los cambios de brillo.En situaciones como en las aplicaciones CAD y CAM donde el fotorrealismo no es un objetivo,el modelo de sombreado Gooch en conjunto con algún tipo de entintado de bordes de siluetas es una solución popular.

trans-unit.source: The GoochMaterial provides a material that implements the Gooch shading model, popular in CAD and CAM applications. More...

trans-unit.source: The Google Play market place allows you to register your application, as well as the in-app products you want to make available to it, without publishing it. The following guide gives a brief introduction on uploading your application to Google Play and registering products.

The HBarModelMapper type enables using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A horizontal model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and AbstractBarSeries, so that each row in the data model defines a bar set and each column maps to a category in a bar series. You need to implement the data model and expose it to QML.

The HBoxPlotModelMapper type enables using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A horizontal model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and a BoxPlotSeries type, so that each row in the data model defines a box-and-whiskers item and each column maps to the range and three median values of the box-and-whiskers item.

trans-unit.source: The IANA IDs and database are also know as the Olson IDs and database, named after their creator.
trans-unit.target: Los ID y la base de datos de la IANA también son conocidos como los ID y la base de datos de Olson,que llevan el nombre de su creador.

trans-unit.source: The IANA IDs can and do change on a regular basis, and can vary depending on how recently the host system data was updated. As such you cannot rely on any given ID existing on any host system. You must use availableTimeZoneIds() to determine what IANA IDs are available.
trans-unit.target: Las ID de IANA pueden cambiar y cambian de forma regular, y pueden variar según la fecha de actualización de los datos del sistema host. Como tal, no puede confiar en ningún ID dado existente en ningún sistema host. Debe usar availableTimeZoneIds () para determinar qué ID de IANA están disponibles.

trans-unit.source: The INF files assume a static build of Qt, so no dependencies to other DLLs are listed in the INF files. To distribute an ActiveX server depending on DLLs you must add the dependencies, and provide the library files with the archive.
trans-unit.target: Los archivos INF asumen una construcción estática de Qt,por lo que no hay dependencias con otras DLLs en los archivos INF.Para distribuir un servidor ActiveX que depende de DLLs,debe agregar las dependencias,y proporcionar los archivos de la biblioteca con el archivo.

trans-unit.source: The INI file format has severe restrictions on the syntax of a key. Qt works around this by using % as an escape character in keys. In addition, if you save a top-level setting (a key with no slashes in it, e.g., "someKey"), it will appear in the INI file's "General" section. To avoid overwriting other keys, if you save something using a key such as "General/someKey", the key will be located in the "%General" section,
trans-unit.target: El formato de archivo INI tiene severas restricciones en la sintaxis de una clave. Qt soluciona este problema utilizando % como carácter de escape en las claves. Además, si guarda una configuración de nivel superior (una clave sin barras, por ejemplo, "alguna clave"), aparecerá en la sección "General" del archivo INI. Para evitar sobrescribir otras claves, si guarda algo usando una clave como "General / someKey", la clave se ubicará en la sección "% General",

trans-unit.source: The ImageModel is a read-only model used to fetch images related to a Place. Binding a Place via ImageModel::place initiates an initial fetch of images. The model performs fetches incrementally and is intended to be used in conjunction with a View such as a ListView. When the View reaches the last of the images currently in the model, a fetch is performed to retrieve more if they are available. The View is automatically updated as the images are received. The number of images which are fetched at a time is specified by the batchSize property. The total number of images available can be accessed via the totalCount property.
The ImageModel type provides a model of place images. More...

trans-unit.source: The Imagine Style is based on configurable image assets. More...

The Imagine style allows customizing the path that is used to do the image asset selection. The path can be specified for any window or item, and it automatically propagates to children in the same manner as fonts. In the following example, the window and all three radio buttons appear with dark image assets (files that are located in "qrc:/themes/dark").
trans-unit.target: El estilo Imagine permite personalizar la ruta que se utiliza para hacer la selección de activos de imagen. La ruta se puede especificar para cualquier ventana o elemento, y se propaga automáticamente a los niños de la misma manera que las fuentes . En el siguiente ejemplo, la ventana y los tres botones de opción aparecen con activos de imagen oscura (archivos que se encuentran en "qrc: / themes / dark").

trans-unit.source: The Imagine style allows customizing the path that is used to do the image asset selection. The path can be specified for any window or item, and it automatically propagates to children in the same manner as fonts. In the following example, the window and all three radio buttons appear with dark image assets (files that are located in "qrc:/themes/dark").

The Imagine style is based on image assets. The style comes with a default set of images, but the images can be easily changed by providing a directory with images using a predefined naming convention.
trans-unit.target: El estilo Imagine se basa en los activos de imagen.El estilo viene con un conjunto de imágenes predeterminadas,pero las imágenes pueden ser fácilmente cambiadas proporcionando un directorio con imágenes usando una convención de nombres predefinida.

trans-unit.source: The Imagine style must be separately imported to gain access to the attributes that are specific to the Imagine style. It should be noted that regardless of the references to the Imagine style, the same application code runs with any other style. Imagine-specific attributes only have an effect when the application is run with the Imagine style.
trans-unit.target: El estilo Imagine debe ser importado por separado para acceder a los atributos que son específicos del estilo Imagine.Debe tenerse en cuenta que,independientemente de las referencias al estilo Imagine,el mismo código de la aplicación se ejecuta con cualquier otro estilo.Los atributos específicos de Imagine sólo tienen efecto cuando la aplicación se ejecuta con el estilo Imagine.

trans-unit.source: The Imagine style supports palette customization via the palette property and the qtquickcontrols2.conf file. As with other styles, the exact palette roles that the Imagine style uses are style-dependent. However, as most of the visual appearance of controls (for example: backgrounds) are managed through image assets, only the roles that are typically used for text will have an effect.

The Imagine style supports palette customization via the palette property and the qtquickcontrols2.conf file. As with other styles, the exact palette roles that the Imagine style uses are style-dependent. However, as most of the visual appearance of controls (for example: backgrounds) are managed through image assets, only the roles that are typically used for text will have an effect.
trans-unit.target: El estilo Imagine admite la personalización de la paleta mediante la propiedad de la paleta y el archivo qtquickcontrols2.conf . Al igual que con otros estilos, las funciones de paleta exactas que utiliza el estilo Imagine dependen del estilo. Sin embargo, como la mayor parte de la apariencia visual de los controles (por ejemplo: fondos) se administra a través de activos de imagen, solo tendrán efecto los roles que se usan normalmente para el texto.

trans-unit.source: The Imagine style supports palette customization via the palette property and the qtquickcontrols2.conf file. As with other styles, the exact palette roles that the Imagine style uses are style-dependent. However, as most of the visual appearance of controls (for example: backgrounds) are managed through image assets, only the roles that are typically used for text will have an effect.

trans-unit.source: The Java style, as well as all other styles implemented in Qt, does not use PE_FrameButtonBevel. trans-unit.source: The Java-style iterators are new in Qt 4 and are the standard ones used in Qt applications. They are more convenient to use than the STL-style iterators, at the price of being slightly less efficient. Their API is modelled on Java's iterator classes.
trans-unit.target: Los iteradores de estilo Java son nuevos en el Qt 4 y son los estándar utilizados en las aplicaciones del Qt.Son más convenientes de usar que los iteradores de estilo STL,al precio de ser ligeramente menos eficientes.Su API está modelado en las clases de iteradores de Java.

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript environment provided by QML is stricter than that in a web browser. For example, in QML you cannot add to, or modify, members of the JavaScript global object. In regular JavaScript, it is possible to do this accidentally by using a variable without declaring it. In QML this will throw an exception, so all local variables must be explicitly declared. See JavaScript Environment Restrictions for a complete description of the restrictions on JavaScript code executed from QML.
trans-unit.target: El entorno JavaScript proporcionado por QML es más estricto que el de un navegador web. Por ejemplo, en QML no se pueden agregar ni modificar miembros del objeto global de JavaScript. En JavaScript normal, es posible hacer esto accidentalmente usando una variable sin declararla. En QML, esto arrojará una excepción, por lo que todas las variables locales deben declararse explícitamente. Consulte Restricciones del entorno JavaScript para obtener una descripción completa de las restricciones sobre el código JavaScript ejecutado desde QML.

trans-unit.source: The Joint node is used to build skeletons as part of the skinned mesh support in Qt 3D. A joint can be transformed by way of its scale, rotation and translation properties. Any mesh vertices that are bound to the joint will have their transformations updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: El nodo de la articulación se utiliza para construir esqueletos como parte del soporte de la malla de piel en Qt 3D.Una articulación puede ser transformada por medio de sus propiedades de escala,rotación y traslación.Cualquier vértice de la malla que esté ligado a la unión tendrá sus transformaciones actualizadas en consecuencia.

trans-unit.source: The Julian calendar gains against the mean tropical year at the rate of one day in 128 years. For the Gregorian calendar, the figure is one day in 3030 years. The difference in the average length of the year between Julian (365.25 days) and Gregorian (365.2425 days) is 0.002%.

The Julian calendar, proposed by Julius Caesar in 46 BC (708 AUC), was a reform of the Roman calendar. It took effect on 1 January 45 BC (AUC 709), by edict. It was the predominant calendar in the Roman world, most of Europe, and in European settlements in the Americas and elsewhere, until it was refined and gradually replaced by the Gregorian calendar, promulgated in 1582 by Pope Gregory XIII.

The JumpListSeparator type represents a separator in a Jump List. This value is used only for task lists.

The MS C++ compiler for .NET on the other hand, can produce both normal and managed code. To write a C++ class that can be compiled into managed code, the developer must flag the class as managed using the __gc keyword, and restrict the code to only use the subset of C++ known as "Managed Extensions for C++", or MC++ for short. The advantage is that MC++ code can freely call and use normal C++ functions and classes. And it also works the other way around: normal C++ code can call managed functions and use managed classes (e.g. the entire .NET framework class library), including managed functions and classes implemented in C# or VB.NET. This feature of mixing managed and normal C++ code immensely eases the interoperability with .NET, and is by Microsoft referred to as the "It Just Works" (IJW) feature.
trans-unit.target: El compilador MS C ++ para .NET, por otro lado, puede producir código tanto normal como administrado. Para escribir una clase de C ++ que se pueda compilar en código administrado, el desarrollador debe marcar la clase como administrada con la palabra clave __gc y restringir el código para usar solo el subconjunto de C ++ conocido como "Extensiones administradas para C ++", o MC ++ para abreviar . La ventaja es que el código MC ++ puede llamar y utilizar libremente funciones y clases normales de C ++. Y también funciona al revés: el código C ++ normal puede llamar a funciones administradas y usar clases administradas (por ejemplo, toda la biblioteca de clases del marco .NET), incluidas las funciones administradas y las clases implementadas en C # o VB.NET. Esta característica de mezclar código C ++ normal y administrado facilita enormemente la interoperabilidad con .NET, y Microsoft la denomina "It Just Works".(IJW) característica.

trans-unit.source: The MS compilers for C# and VB.NET will only produce managed code. Such programs cannot directly call normal, native functions or classes.
trans-unit.target: Los compiladores de MS para C#y VB.NET sólo producirán código administrado.Tales programas no pueden llamar directamente a funciones o clases normales y nativas.

trans-unit.source: The Map type includes support for pinch and flick gestures to control zooming and panning. These are enabled by default, and available at any time by using the gesture object. The actual GestureArea is constructed specially at startup and cannot be replaced or destroyed. Its properties can be altered, however, to control its behavior.
trans-unit.target: El tipo de mapa incluye soporte para los gestos de pellizcar y deslizar para controlar el zoom y la panorámica. Estos están habilitados de forma predeterminada y están disponibles en cualquier momento mediante el objeto de gesto . El GestureArea real se construye especialmente al inicio y no se puede reemplazar ni destruir. Sin embargo, sus propiedades pueden modificarse para controlar su comportamiento.

trans-unit.source: The Map type is used to display a map or image of the Earth, with the capability to also display interactive objects tied to the map's surface.
trans-unit.target: El tipo de mapa se utiliza para mostrar un mapa o una imagen de la Tierra,con la capacidad de mostrar también objetos interactivos vinculados a la superficie del mapa.

trans-unit.source: The MapCircle type displays a geographic circle on a Map, which consists of all points that are within a set distance from one central point. Depending on map projection, a geographic circle may not always be a perfect circle on the screen: for instance, in the Mercator projection, circles become ovoid in shape as they near the poles. To display a perfect screen circle around a point, use a MapQuickItem containing a relevant Qt Quick type instead.
The MapCircle type displays a geographic circle on a Map. More...
The MapCircleObject displays a circle on a Map. More...
The MapCircleObject displays a circle on a Map. The MapIconObject type only makes sense when contained in a Map or in a MapObjectView.
The MapCopyrightNotice item displays the current valid copyright notice for a Map element. More...

The MapGestureArea, when enabled, must process all incoming touch events in order to track the shape and size of the "pinch". The overhead added on touch events can be considered constant time.

The MapObjectView type only makes sense when contained in a Map, meaning that it will not work when added inside other QML elements. This can also be intended as an object layer on top of a Map.
The MapPolygon type displays a polygon on a Map, specified in terms of an ordered list of coordinates. For best appearance and results, polygons should be simple (not self-intersecting).

The MapPolyline type displays a polyline on a map, specified in terms of an ordered list of coordinates. The coordinates on the path cannot be directly changed after being added to the Polyline. Instead, copy the path into a var, modify the copy and reassign the copy back to the path.
The MapPolyline type displays a polyline on a map. More...
The MapPolylineObject displays a polyline on a Map. More...
The MapPolylineObject displays a polyline on a Map. The MapPolylineObject type only makes sense when contained in a Map or in a MapObjectView.
The MapQuickItem type displays an arbitrary Qt Quick object on a Map. More...

The MapQuickItem type is used to place an arbitrary Qt Quick object on a Map at a specified location and size. Compared to floating an item above the Map, a MapQuickItem will follow the panning (and optionally, the zooming) of the Map as if it is on the Map surface.
The MapRectangle type displays a rectangle on a Map. More...

The MapRectangle type displays a rectangle on a Map. Rectangles are a special case of Polygon with exactly 4 vertices and 4 "straight" edges. In this case, "straight" means that the top-left point has the same latitude as the top-right point (the top edge), and the bottom-left point has the same latitude as the bottom-right point (the bottom edge). Similarly, the points on the left side have the same longitude, and the points on the right side have the same longitude.
The MapRoute type displays a Route obtained through a RouteModel or other means, on the Map as a Polyline following the path of the Route.
The MapRoute type displays a Route on a Map. More...
The MapRouteObject displays a geographical route on a Map. More...

The Material style also supports a dense variant, where controls like buttons and delegates are smaller in height and use smaller font sizes. It is recommended to use the dense variant on desktop platforms, where a mouse and keyboard allow more precise and flexible user interaction.

trans-unit.source: The Navigator purpose is to use a plugin's turn-by-turn navigation implementation in a QML application in a seamless manner. This object may take control of the map position, orientation, tilting and zoom, as well as changing the map style, elements on the map such as direction information. In certain cases, it may also restrict user interaction with the Map and with the items on it.
trans-unit.target: El propósito del Navegador es utilizar la implementación de navegación giro a giro de un plugin en una aplicación QML de una manera fluida.Este objeto puede tomar el control de la posición del mapa,la orientación,la inclinación y el zoom,así como cambiar el estilo del mapa,elementos del mapa como la información de dirección.En ciertos casos,también puede restringir la interacción del usuario con el mapa y con los elementos en él.

trans-unit.source: The NdefFilter type is used with the NearField type to read NDEF messages from NFC Forum tags that match a given structure.
The NdefMimeRecord type can contain data with an associated MIME type. The data is accessible from the uri in the uri property.
The NdefRecord type is the base type for all NDEF record types in QML. It contains a single property holding the type of record.
The NdefRecord type represents a record in an NDEF message. More...

The NdefTextRecord type contains a localized piece of text that can be display to the user. An NDEF message may contain many text records for different locales, it is up to the application to select the most appropriate one to display to the user. The localeMatch property can be used to determine if the text record has been matched.
The NdefUriRecord type can contain a uniform resource identifier.

The NearField type can be used to read NDEF messages from NFC Forum tags. Set the filter and orderMatch properties to match the required NDEF messages. Once an NDEF message is successfully read from a tag the messageRecords property is updated.

trans-unit.source: The Network Access API is a collection of classes for performing common network operations. The API provides an abstraction layer over the specific operations and protocols used (for example, getting and posting data over HTTP), and only exposes classes, functions, and signals for general or high level concepts.
trans-unit.target: La API de acceso a la red es una colección de clases para realizar operaciones de red comunes.La API proporciona una capa de abstracción sobre las operaciones y los protocolos específicos utilizados (por ejemplo,la obtención y la publicación de datos a través de HTTP),y sólo expone clases,funciones y señales para conceptos generales o de alto nivel.

trans-unit.source: The Network Access API is constructed around one QNetworkAccessManager object, which holds the common configuration and settings for the requests it sends. It contains the proxy and cache configuration, as well as the signals related to such issues, and reply signals that can be used to monitor the progress of a network operation. One QNetworkAccessManager instance should be enough for the whole Qt application. Since QNetworkAccessManager is based on QObject, it can only be used from the thread it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: La API de acceso a la red se construye alrededor de un objeto QNetworkAccessManager , que contiene la configuración común y los parámetros de las solicitudes que envía. Contiene la configuración de caché y proxy, así como las señales relacionadas con dichos problemas, y señales de respuesta que se pueden usar para monitorear el progreso de una operación de red. Una instancia de QNetworkAccessManager debería ser suficiente para toda la aplicación Qt. Dado que QNetworkAccessManager se basa en QObject , solo se puede usar desde el hilo al que pertenece.

trans-unit.source: The Network Access API is constructed around one QNetworkAccessManager object, which holds the common configuration and settings for the requests it sends. It contains the proxy and cache configuration, as well as the signals related to such issues, and reply signals that can be used to monitor the progress of a network operation. One QNetworkAccessManager instance should be enough for the whole Qt application. Since QNetworkAccessManager is based on QObject, it can only be used from the thread it belongs to.
The Node type provides an entry point to a Qt Remote Objects network. A network can be as simple as two nodes, or an arbitrarily complex set of processes and devices.
trans-unit.target: El tipo de nodo proporciona un punto de entrada a una red de Qt Remote Objects.Una red puede ser tan simple como dos nodos,o un conjunto arbitrariamente complejo de procesos y dispositivos.

trans-unit.source: The Node type serves as the base class for other spatial types, such as, Model, Camera, Light. These objects represent an entity that exists in the 3D scene, due to having a position and other properties in the 3D world. With the exception of the root node(s), all Node types are transformed relative to their parent Node, that is, in local coordinates. In many ways the Node type serves the same purpose in Qt Quick 3D scenes as Item does for Qt Quick scenes.

The NodeInstantiator element will manage the objects it creates. Those objects are parented to the Instantiator and can also be deleted by the NodeInstantiator if the NodeInstantiator's properties change. Nodes can also be destroyed dynamically through other means, and the NodeInstantiator will not recreate them unless the properties of the NodeInstantiator change.

trans-unit.source: The OpenGL timer queries objects are queried in sequence to record the GPU timestamps at positions of interest in your rendering code. Once the results for all issues timer queries become available, the results can be fetched and QOpenGLTimerMonitor will calculate the recorded time intervals for you.
trans-unit.target: El temporizador OpenGL consulta los objetos en secuencia para registrar las marcas de tiempo de la GPU en las posiciones de interés de su código de renderizado.Una vez que estén disponibles los resultados de todas las consultas de temporizador de ediciones,los resultados se pueden recuperar y QOpenGLTimerMonitor calculará los intervalos de tiempo grabados para ti.

The OpenStreetMap plugin retrieves the provider's information from a remote repository. This is done to prevent using hardcoded servers by default, which may become unavailable. By default this information is fetched from maps-redirect.qt.io. Setting this parameter changes the provider repository address to a user-specified one, which must contain the files street, satellite, cycle, transit, night-transit, terrain and hiking, each of which must contain valid provider information.
trans-unit.target: El complemento OpenStreetMap recupera la información del proveedor de un repositorio remoto. Esto se hace para evitar el uso de servidores codificados de forma predeterminada, que pueden dejar de estar disponibles. De forma predeterminada, esta información se obtiene de maps-redirect.qt.io . La configuración de este parámetro cambia la dirección del repositorio del proveedor a una especificada por el usuario, que debe contener los archivos street , satellite , cycle , transit , tránsito night-transit , terrain y hiking , cada uno de los cuales debe contener información válida del proveedor.

trans-unit.source: The Place type has many properties holding information about the location. Details on how to contact the place are available from the contactDetails property. Convenience properties for obtaining the primary phone, fax, email and website are also available.

trans-unit.source: The Place type represents a physical location with additional metadata describing that location. Contrasted with Location, Address, and coordinate type which are used to describe where a location is. The basic properties of a Place are its name and location.

En contraste con Ubicación , Dirección y tipo de coordenadas que se utilizan para describir dónde está una ubicación. Las propiedades básicas de un lugar son su nombre y ubicación .

The PlaceSearchModel API has some limited support for paging. The nextPage() and previousPage() functions as well as the limit property can be used to access paged search results. When the limit property is set the search result page contains at most limit entries (of type place result). For example, if the backend has 5 search results in total [a,b,c,d,e], and assuming the first page is shown and limit of 3 has been set then a,b,c is returned. The nextPage() would return d,e. The nextPagesAvailable and previousPagesAvailable properties can be used to check for further pages. At the moment the API does not support the means to retrieve the total number of items available from the backed. Note that support for nextPage(), previousPage() and limit can vary according to the plugin.

The PlaceSearchModel listens for places that have been updated or removed from its plugin's backend. If it detects that a place has been updated and that place is currently present in the model, then it will call Place::getDetails to refresh the details. If it detects that a place has been removed, then correspondingly the place will be removed from the model if it is currently present.
The PlaceSearchModel returns both sponsored and organic search results. Sponsored search results will have the sponsored role set to true.

The PlaceSearchSuggestionModel can be used to provide search term suggestions as the user enters their search term. The properties of this model should match that of the PlaceSearchModel, which will be used to perform the actual search query, to ensure that the search suggestion results are relevant.

The Places API allows users to discover places of interest and view details about them, such as address and contact information. Some places may have additional content associated with them, such as images and reviews. The Places API also facilitates management of places and categories, allowing users to save and remove them.
trans-unit.target: El API de Lugares permite a los usuarios descubrir lugares de interés y ver detalles sobre ellos,como la dirección y la información de contacto.Algunos lugares pueden tener un contenido adicional asociado a ellos,como imágenes y reseñas.El API de Lugares también facilita la gestión de los lugares y las categorías,permitiendo a los usuarios guardarlos y eliminarlos.

trans-unit.source: The Places API allows users to discover places/points of interest and view details about them such as address and contact information; some places may even have rich content such as images and reviews. The Places API also facilitates management of places and categories, allowing users to save and remove them.
trans-unit.target: El API de Lugares permite a los usuarios descubrir lugares/puntos de interés y ver detalles sobre ellos,como la dirección y la información de contacto;algunos lugares pueden incluso tener un contenido rico,como imágenes y reseñas.El API de Lugares también facilita la gestión de lugares y categorías,permitiendo a los usuarios guardarlos y eliminarlos.

trans-unit.source: The Places API is currently designed for only saving
trans-unit.target: El API de Lugares está diseñado actualmente sólo para guardar

trans-unit.source: The Places API only supports saving of the following
trans-unit.target: El API de Lugares sólo admite el almacenamiento de lo siguiente

trans-unit.source: The Places API supports the concept of favorites. Favorites are generally implemented by using two plugins, the first plugin is typically a read-only source of places (origin plugin) and a second read/write plugin (destination plugin) is used to store places from the origin as favorites.
trans-unit.target: El API de Lugares apoya el concepto de favoritos.Los favoritos se implementan generalmente mediante el uso de dos plugins,el primero es típicamente una fuente de sólo lectura de lugares (plugin de origen)y un segundo plugin de lectura/escritura (plugin de destino)se utiliza para almacenar lugares del origen como favoritos.

trans-unit.source: The Places submodule is the natural complement to Positioning, providing a source of geographical data about Places of Interest (POI). Besides the source information, the API provides information about the location, size, and other related information about a POI. The Places API can also retrieve images, reviews, and other content related to a place.
trans-unit.target: El submódulo Lugares es el complemento natural del Posicionamiento,ya que proporciona una fuente de datos geográficos sobre los Lugares de Interés (PDI).Además de la información de la fuente,el API proporciona información sobre la ubicación,el tamaño y otra información relacionada con un PDI.El API de Lugares también puede recuperar imágenes,reseñas y otros contenidos relacionados con un lugar.

The Playlist type provides a way to play a list of media with the MediaPlayer, Audio and Video types. It can be used as a data source for view elements (such as ListView) and other elements that interact with model data (such as Repeater). When used as a data model, each playlist item's source URL can be accessed using the source role.
trans-unit.target: El tipo de lista de reproducción proporciona una forma de reproducir una lista de medios con los tipos MediaPlayer , Audio y Video. Se puede utilizar como fuente de datos para elementos de vista (como ListView ) y otros elementos que interactúan con los datos del modelo (como Repeater). Cuando se utiliza como modelo de datos, se puede acceder a la URL de origen de cada elemento de la lista de reproducción mediante el rol de source .

trans-unit.target: El tipo de posición contiene valores relacionados con la ubicación geográfica, como una coordenada (longitud, latitud y altitud), la marca de tiempo cuando se obtuvo la posición, la velocidad en ese momento y la precisión de los datos.

trans-unit.source: The PositionSource type provides information about the user device's current position. The position is available as a Position type, which contains all the standard parameters typically available from GPS and other similar systems, including longitude, latitude, speed and accuracy details.
The PositionSource type provides the device's current position. More...

The Positioning component of the Qt Location API is about the geographical position, size and address of some place. Positioning contains a QGeoCoordinate class, containing latitude, longitude and altitude in meters. QGeoLocation contains a QGeoCoordinate plus address and size information (a bounding box) so that positions can be more than mathematical points. Movement into or out of the defined bounding box areas can be monitored. The API also allows the developer to control the source of the positional information as well.
trans-unit.target: El componente de posicionamiento de la API de ubicación de Qt trata sobre la posición geográfica, el tamaño y la dirección de algún lugar. El posicionamiento contiene una clase QGeoCoordinate , que contiene latitud, longitud y altitud en metros. QGeoLocation contiene una QGeoCoordinate más información de dirección y tamaño (un cuadro delimitador) para que las posiciones puedan ser más que puntos matemáticos. Se puede controlar el movimiento dentro o fuera de las áreas definidas del cuadro delimitador. La API también permite al desarrollador controlar la fuente de la información posicional.

trans-unit.source: The Property Editor always displays properties of the currently selected object on the form. The available properties depend on the object being edited, but all of the widgets provided have common properties such as objectName, the object's internal name, and enabled, the property that determines whether an object can be interacted with or not.
